header.title: Manta Config Engine App
header.text: A web-application to generate {<0}advanced configuration files{0>} for {<1}Dota 2{1>}.

list.click: Click on the keys you want to customize

copy.text: Copy the files in the zip to your autoexec folder{0}

list.restart: Starte Dota 2 neu, oder tippe {0} in die Konsole

tip.text: {<b}Tipp:{b>} You need to remove the ingame-keybinds{0}
tip.tooltip:
Manta {<b}can't use keys bound in the Dota 2 settings{b>}.
To unset a key in Dota, just go to the ingame settings,
click the keybind you need to remove and hit {0}
If you don't have {0} just press {1}Any Key{1}.
Repeat this for every key you need to unbind.

quickcast.headline: Fantastisches QuickCast
quickcast.content: Use QuickCast without losing the ability to SelfCast by binding {0} to SelfCast and {1} to QuickCast. Included in the default preset of Manta.

layouts.headline: Mehrere Tastenbelegungen
layouts.content: You can create as many layouts as you want. That allows you to use nearly unlimited keyboard shortcuts. Call {0} with {1} & more.

settings.headline: Erweiterte Einstellungen
settings.content: The {<0}Settings{0>} section of Manta allows you to customize nearly everything, including hidden settings and features like {<b}Force Movement Direction{b>}{1} or {<b}Auto-Repeat Right-Mouse{b>}{2}

tooltips.1:
Turn your hero before moving when pressing {0}.
Useful for hitting Shadow Raze or Forcestaff.
tooltips.2: Wiederholt Bewegungs- und Angriffskomandos solange die rechte Maustaste gedrückt wird.

portable.headline: Überall Verfügbar
portable.content: You can {<b}use the same configuration everywhere you go{b>}, since you only need your autoexec. It's also possible to {<b}share a computer with multiple players{b>}, while everyone can use their own settings.

everybody.headline: Customization For Everybody
everybody.content: Manta attempts to be the {<b}easiest way to get a customized Dota experience{b>}. The configuration files it creates are designed to be {<0}human-readable{0>}.

chatwheels.headline: Unendlich Viele Chat-Räder
chatwheels.content: The default layout of Manta has two Chatwheels. One bound to {0} and one bound to {1}. You can customize them in the {<2}Chatwheel Manager{2>}.
